item.title: The Vines Resort & Country Club introduces a new garden venue for meetings, incentives, conferences, and events
item.description:
Source: The Vines Resort & Country Club. The Pavilion. The Vines Resort & Country Club, located near Perth, Australia, has introduced “The Pavilion.” This new event space is a specially designed garden structure situated at the front of the resort, offering scenic views of the golf course and surrounding gardens. It’s an excellent choice for events such as conference gatherings or product launches. The open-air venue, capable of hosting 100 guests, has three sides open to the elements...

item.title: Dubai Golf introduces special promotions for Ramadan
item.description:
Source: Dubai Golf website. During Ramadan, Dubai Golf has several special iftar and suhoor packages perfect for corporate events. QD’s QD’s has a special Ramadan tent where they serve both iftar and suhoor. The daily iftar buffet features a variety of traditional hot and cold Arabic mezze, soups, Middle Eastern and international main dishes, and desserts. This comes with your choice of juice and traditional Arabic sweets and dates...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/dubai-golf-introduces-special-promotions-for-ramadan/

item.title: Bangi Golf Resort reintroduces the beloved Buffet Ramadhan
item.description:
Source: BGR. From June 21st to July 15th, 2015, Bangi Golf Resort Restaurant (BGR) will be offering its special Buffet Ramadhan in honor of the holy month. Executive Chef Kamaruddin highlights the Buffet Ramadhan’s popularity, stating that it has always been a top pick for gatherings of family, friends, and colleagues during Ramadhan. He emphasizes the restaurant’s commitment to providing a diverse menu with new offerings while upholding the quality and authentic flavors of classic dishes...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/bangi-golf-resort-reintroduces-the-beloved-buffet-ramadhan/

item.title: The TomTom Golfer 2 GPS Watch is created to assist golfers in enhancing their game
item.description:
TomTom has introduced the TomTom Golfer 2, a slim GPS watch designed for golfers. The watch uses automatic shot detection to provide detailed analysis after a round, aiming to improve users’ games. The TomTom Golfer 2 eliminates uncertainty on the course by measuring distances to greens and hazards. This automatic shot detection helps golfers understand their distance potential by displaying distances for drives and approach shots at a glance. After the game, golfers can analyze their strokes in detail using TomTom MySports...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-tomtom-golfer-2-gps-watch-is-created-to-assist-golfers-in-enhancing-their-game/

item.title: Hong Kong Airlines increases frequency on Hong Kong-Haikou route with two additional flights per week
item.description:
Starting December 25th, Hong Kong Airlines will offer two more weekly flights on its route between Hong Kong and Haikou, increasing the total frequency to nine flights per week. The new flights to Haikou will operate on Fridays and Sundays. Flight no.* Route Departure/Arrival time* Frequency HX157 Hong Kong to Haikou 19:25/20:50 Every Friday 18:15/19:45 Every Sunday HX158 Haikou to Hong Kong 21:55/23:15 Every Friday 21:15/22:35 Every Sunday *Flight number and schedule may change without prior notice...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/hong-kong-airlines-increases-frequency-on-hong-kong-haikou-route-with-two-additional-flights-per-week/
